boardgame.description: Turtle Race_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From Spielbox:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Turtles are not always in a hurry, but even they get to be in a race to try and become the first turtle to get to the tasty salad at the other end of the field. But since turtles don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t have a lot of endurance, they like to rest once in a while _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; preferably on the back of another turtle so that they can get carried for a little while._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Before starting the game, each player secretly draws a color to know which turtles they are with. Turtles' movement is controlled by cards drawn from a common pool (always chosen from 5 cards in hand). These cards depict colored (one-color or rainbow) turtles and movement (1 or 2 steps forward, 1 step backwards; also, in case of some rainbow-colored turtle cards, moving the last turtle forward). When a turtle moves on a space where another turle is waiting, it is placed on the top of that turtle. When a turtle with other turtles on its back is moved, all the other turtles on top of it are carried with this turtle. The first turtle to reach the last field wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Ribbit_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, SimplyFun's 2007 reprint, has frogs instead of turtles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Schildkrötenrennen FAQ_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 and up_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Inventory:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 game board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 5 wooden frogs in five different colors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 5 frog tiles in matching face colors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 52 cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 8 of each of five colors, including _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2 -_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 5 +_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 ++_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 12 rainbow colored, including_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 3 -_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 4 +_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 3 single arrows_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2 double arrows_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 rules sheet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 Fun Memories Booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Ribbit SimplyFun 2007 Game is complete (well, except for the box insert) and in excellent condition.. Includes game board, 5 frogs _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; tiles, 52 cards, rules, memory book, and a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Host a Ribbit Party! advertisement. Box has very minor wear and tear, but is structurally sound. There is a crease in one corner of the box top, bowing on the box bottom, a small paper tear on the corner of the box lid, and minor shelfwear. (16)
